availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Davis (Scioto County, Ohio, farmer and banker)

body.p: Scioto County, Ohio, farmer and banker. Pennsylvania native. Married to Dorthula Davis. Father of Mary Davis, Isabelle Davis, and Maude Davis. Farmer in Jefferson, Ohio, in 1860. Employed William Porter, George Cook, Van Williams, and Stephen Slaughter in Jefferson in 1860. Partner in the Banking House of Thomas Dugan & Co.in Portsmouth in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Ohio, Scioto County, Jefferson, p. 32.
KYR-0001-007-0392.
